bundle.name: dns_slave

description.p: This bundle installs the Domain Name Server (bind9) on your machine.

field.name: domain
field.label: Domain
field.description:
The name of the domain used for this secondary DNS server. For example: "snapwebsites.net"
Note: this is for a "slave" DNS server, which will copy info from the primary. When you set up your DNS server, that will be "NS1", and this will be "NS2".
